title: 新约 - 彼得后书(2Peter) - 第 1 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 彼得后书(2Peter) -- 第 1 章 ( 本篇共有 3 章 )

lineList.en: Simon Peter, a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ, to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ:
lineList.cn: 作耶稣基督仆人和使徒的西门彼得，写信给那因我们的神，和（有古卷无和字）救主耶稣基督之义，与我们同得一样宝贵信心的人。

lineList.en: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord,
lineList.cn: 愿恩惠平安，因你们认识神和我们主耶稣，多多的加给你们。

lineList.en: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness, through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue:
lineList.cn: 神的神能已经将一切关乎生命和虔敬的事赐给我们，皆因我们认识那用自己荣耀和美德召我们的主。

lineList.en: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.
lineList.cn: 因此他已将又宝贵又极大的应许赐给我们，叫我们既脱离世上从情欲来的败坏，就得与神的性情有分。

lineList.en: And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;
lineList.cn: 正因这缘故，你们要分外的殷勤。有了信心，又要加上德行。有了德行，又要加上知识。

lineList.en: And to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness;
lineList.cn: 有了知识，又要加上节制。有了节制，又要加上忍耐。有了忍耐，又要加上虔敬。

lineList.en: And to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.
lineList.cn: 有了虔敬，又要加上爱弟兄的心。有了爱弟兄的心，又要加上爱众人的心

lineList.en: For if these things be in you, and abound, they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.
lineList.cn: 你们若充充足足的有这几样，就必使你们在认识我们的主耶稣基督上，不至于闲懒不结果子了。

lineList.en: But he that lacketh these things is blind, and cannot see afar off, and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins.
lineList.cn: 人若没有这几样，就是眼瞎，只看见近处的，忘了他旧日的罪已经得了洁净。

lineList.en: Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall:
lineList.cn: 所以弟兄们，应当更加殷勤，使你们所蒙的恩召和拣选坚定不移。你们若行这几样，就永不失脚。

lineList.en: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
lineList.cn: 这样，必叫你们丰丰富富的，得以进入我们主救主耶稣基督永远的国。

lineList.en: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things, though ye know them, and be established in the present truth.
lineList.cn: 你们虽然晓得这些事，并且在你们已有的真道上坚固，我却要将这些事常常题醒你们。

lineList.en: Yea, I think it meet, as long as I am in this tabernacle, to stir you up by putting you in remembrance;
lineList.cn: 我以为应当趁我还在这帐棚的时候题醒你们，激发你们。

lineList.en: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle, even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me.
lineList.cn: 因为知道我脱离这帐棚的时候快到了，正如我们主耶稣基督所指示我的。

lineList.en: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance.
lineList.cn: 并且我尽心竭力，使你们在我去世以后，时常记念这些事。

lineList.en: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables, when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but were eyewitnesses of his majesty.
lineList.cn: 我们从前，将我们主耶稣基督的大能，和他降临的事，告诉你们，并不是随从乖巧捏造的虚言，乃是亲眼见过他的威荣。

lineList.en: For he received from God the Father honour and glory, when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
lineList.cn: 他从父神得尊贵荣耀的时候，从极大荣光之中，有声音出来向他说，这是我的爱子，我所喜悦的。

lineList.en: And this voice which came from heaven we heard, when we were with him in the holy mount.
lineList.cn: 我们同他在圣山的时候，亲自听见这声音从天上出来。

lineList.en: We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts:
lineList.cn: 我们并有先知更确的预言，如同灯照在暗处。你们在这预言上留意，直等到天发亮晨星在你们心里出现的时候，才是好的。

lineList.en: Knowing this first, that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation.
lineList.cn: 第一要紧的，该知道经上所有的预言，没有可随私意解说的。

lineList.en: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man: but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost.
lineList.cn: 因为预言从来没有出于人意的，乃是人被圣灵感动说出神的话来。
